bib.title: Towards Revised System of Verb Wordnet Relations for Polish.
bib.author: Dziob, Agnieszka and Piasecki, Maciej and Maziarz, Marek and Wieczorek, Justyna and Dobrowolska-Pigon, Marta
bib.abstract: A revised model for the description of verbs in plWordNet-a large wordnet of Polish is presented in the paper. The model has originated from the previous one (the versions 2.0 and 3.0) as a combination of simplifications and expansions. The simplifications were motivated by the collected experience of the previous model implementation for almost 18 thousand Polish verbs. The proposed expansions are meant to improve the description of verbs and support provided by plWordNet for various applications.
